meanings.sent1: She will be resitting the test next week.
meanings.sent2: He is resitting the exam to improve his grade.
meanings.sent3: After forgetting to study, she had to resit the test.
meanings.sent4: The idea of resitting the exam made him nervous.
meanings.sent5: Resitting the exam felt like a second chance to succeed.

meanings.definition: To sit for an examination again.
meanings.sent1: They are resitting the test to show improvement.
meanings.sent2: She resat the exam to achieve a better score.
meanings.sent3: He resits the exam with determination each time.
meanings.sent4: Resitting the exam is like hitting the reset button.
meanings.sent5: The student resitting the exam was focused and prepared.
